evidence.text: UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA CIRCUIT DENKA PERFORMANCE ELASTOMER LLC, Petitioner, v. UNITED STATES ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY and MICHAEL REGAN, Administrator, United States Environmental Protection Agency, Respondents.

extracted.value: Appeal: Denka Performance Elastomer LLC appealed to U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit

evidence.text: 17 | 2023-03-27 | ORDER granting 13 Motion to Appear Pro Hac Vice as to Jeffrey Holmstead. Signed by Judge Carl J Barbier on 3/27/23.

extracted.value: The court granted Denka Performance Elastomer LLC's Motion to Appear Pro Hac Vice as to Jeffrey R. Holmstead, allowing him to appear in the case, signed on March 27, 2023.

evidence.text: 9 | 2023-03-20 | MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by United States of America. Motion(s) will be submitted on 6/14/2023.

extracted.value: United States of America filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction, requesting the court to grant a preliminary injunction, with the motion scheduled for submission on June 14, 2023.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Court adopts the proposed schedule with alterations as stated herein. Final Pretrial Conference: The final pretrial conference shall be held on February 29, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. Trial will commence on Monday, March 11, 2024, at 8:00 am before the District Judge without a jury.

The Court GRANTED the United States of America's Motion to Continue Trial (Rec. Doc. 165) and Motion to Expedite Consideration of the Motion to Continue Trial (Rec. Doc. 166). The trial set for March 11, 2024 and the pre-trial conference set for February 29, 2024 are hereby continued and shall be reset at another date.

extracted.value: Trial scheduled for March 11, 2024, at 8:00 a.m. before District Judge without a jury (per Docket Entry 103, later continued per Docket Entry 169)
